title: Auf Wiedersehen, Sweetheart
description: AU, Italy WWII. Feliciano Vargas is a passionate, if slightly scared, Italian Resistance member. Falling in love with a German pilot was the last thing he expected...and it will test his national loyalty, and his heart, to their limits.Companion story to "We'll Meet Again."Words: 103,957 completeArt Credit: aphin123
author: George DeValier
